document_data.name: Ragged Dain
document_data.mainbody: '''Ragged Dain''' was the Captain of the Guard in [[Citadel Felbarr]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History:
He was a friend of his colleague, [[Reginald Roundshield (senior)|Reginald Roundshield Sr.]], so Ragged became a mentor his son, the young [[Reginald Roundshield]] (in truth, [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] reincarnated). The younger Reginald served under Ragged as a caravan escort.

In [[1484 DR]], at the start of the war with [[orcs]] and [[drow]], he was one of the military leaders convicted by king [[Emerus Warcrown]]
